TEXT.German: Dale's Combat Mod!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Mod de Combate de Dale(DCM)!

TEXT.English: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.
TEXT.French: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.
TEXT.German: Willkommen zu Dales Kampfmodifikation (engl.: combat mod)! Um einzelne Komponenten ein- oder auszuschalten editiere bitte in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml den Wert des Tags für diese Komponente. Die folgenden Komponenten sind eingeschaltet.
TEXT.Italian: Benvenuti al MOD Combattimento di Dale! Per attivare/disattivare i componenti modifica il parametro del componente in 'GlobalDefinesAlt.xml'. Questi sono i compinenti attivi:
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Bienvenido al Mod de Combate de Dale! Para activar o desactivar componentes, por favor edita los valores en GlobalDefinesAlt.xml. Los siguientes componentes están activos.
TEXT.Finnish: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.

TEXT.German: DCM-Konzepte
TEXT.Spanish: DCM Conceptos
Misiones de bombardeo aéreo

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Verteidigungen
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear defensas

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Gebäude
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear edificios

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Fabriken
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear fábricas

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Häfen
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear Puerto

TEXT.German: Strategische Luftbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo Estratégico

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Verteidigungen
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear defensas

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Gebäude
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear edificios

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Fabriken
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear fábricas

TEXT.German: Luftbombardierung Häfen
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardear Puerto

TEXT.German: Strategische Luftbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo Estratégico

TEXT.English: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Luftbombardierung[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Es gibt 5 verschiedene Luftbombardierungen für Flugeinheiten. "Luftbombardierung Verteidigungen" erlaubt die Bombardierung von Geländemodernisierungen oder von Stadtverteigungswerten. "Luftbombardierung Gebäude" erlaubt den Versuch Gebäude in der Stadt zu zerstören. "Luftbombardierung Fabriken" erlaubt den Versuch gezielt die Produktionsanlagen einer Stadt zu zerstören. "PLuftbombardierung Häfen" erlaubt den Versuch ein Schiff im Hafen, mit einer gewissen Wahrscheinlichkeit es zu versenken, zu bombardieren. "Strategische Luftbombardierung" erlaubt den Versuch, die gegenwärtige Produktion der Stadt zu beschädigen. Alle Luftbombardierungen sind durch Abfangmissionen gefährdet.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Missioni di bombardamento[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Esistono cinque differenti missioni di bombardamento aereo. "Bombarda difese" consente di colpire caselle con miglioramenti o danneggiare difese cittadine. "Bombarda edifici" consente di provare a distruggere uno degli edifici cittadini. "Bombarda fabbriche" consente di provare a distruggere uno degli edifici produttivi della città. "Bombarda porto" consente di provare a distruggere una delle navi in porto, con la probabilità di affondarla. "Bombardamento strategico" consente di provare a danneggiare la produzione cittadina in corso. Queste missioni rischiano tutte l'intercettazione aerea.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Misiones de Bombardeo[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Hay cinco misiones de bombardeo distintas para las unidades aéreas. "Bombardear defensas" permite bombardear mejoras o las defensas de la ciudad. "Bombardear edificios" permite intentar destruir uno de los edificios de la ciudad. "Bombardear fábricas" permite que intentes destruir uno de los edificios de producción de la ciudad. "Bombardear Puerto" permite que intentes dañar un barco estacionado en la ciudad, con alguna probabilidad de que lo hundas. "Bombardeo Estratégico" permite que intentes dañar la producción actual de la ciudad. Todas las misiones de bombardeo son susceptibles de ser interceptadas.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.
TEXT.French: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.
TEXT.German: "Luftbombardierung Verteidigungen" ermöglicht die Bombardierungen von Geländemodernisierungen oder Stadtverteidigungsprozente
TEXT.Italian: "Bombarda difese" consente di colpire caselle con miglioramenti o danneggiare difese cittadine.
TEXT.Spanish: "Bombardear defensas" permite bombardear mejoras o las defensas de la ciudad.
TEXT.Finnish: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.

TEXT.English: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.
TEXT.French: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.
TEXT.German: "Luftbombardierung Gebäude" erlaubt den Versuch Gebäude in der Stadt zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: "Bombarda edifici" consente di provare a distruggere uno degli edifici cittadini.
TEXT.Spanish: "Bombardear edificios" permite intentar destruir uno de los edificios de la ciudad.
TEXT.Finnish: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.

TEXT.English: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.
TEXT.French: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.
TEXT.German: "Luftbombardierung Fabriken" erlaubt den Versuch ein Produktionsgebäude in der Stadt zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: "Bombarda fabbriche" consente di provare a distruggere uno degli edifici produttivi della città.
TEXT.Spanish: "Bombardear fábricas" permite que intentes destruir uno de los edificios de producción de la ciudad.
TEXT.Finnish: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.

TEXT.English: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.
TEXT.French: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.
TEXT.German: "Luftbombardierung Häfen" erlaubt den Versuch ein Schiff im Hafen, mit einer gewissen Wahrscheinlichkeit es zu versenken, zu beschädigen.
TEXT.Italian: "Bombarda porto" consente di provare a distruggere una delle navi in porto, con la probabilità di affondarla.
TEXT.Spanish: "Bombardear Puerto" permite que intentes dañar un barco estacionado en la ciudad, con alguna probabilidad de que lo hundas.
TEXT.Finnish: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.

TEXT.English: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.
TEXT.French: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.
TEXT.German: "Strategische Luftbombardierung" erlaubt den Versuch, die gegenwärtige Produktion der Stadt zu beschädigen.
TEXT.Italian: "Bombardamento strategico" consente di provare a danneggiare la produzione cittadina in corso.
TEXT.Spanish: "Bombardeo Estratégico" permite que intentes dañar la producción actual de la ciudad.
TEXT.Finnish: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb defense mission, then click on the target city to reduce defense, or target improvement to destroy it.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité aérienne capable de bombarder, puis la mission de bombardement de défenses. Cliquez ensuite sur la cible pour réduire son pourcentage de défense ou ciblez une amélioration de terrain pour la détruire.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Verteidigungen" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um deren Verteidigung zu schwächen, oder auf eine Modernisierung, um diese zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona un'unità aerea in grado di bombardare, quindi "Bombarda difese" e poi clicca sulla città bersaglio per ridurne le difese, oppure sul miglioramento bersaglio per distruggerlo.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear defensas y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo (para reducir su defensa) o en la mejora objetivo (para destruirla).
TEXT.Finnish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb defense mission, then click on the target city to reduce defense, or target improvement to destroy it.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb building mission, then click on the target city to attempt to destroy one civil building.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité aérienne capable de bombarder, puis la mission de bombardement de bâtiments civils. Cliquez ensuite sur la cible pour tenter de détruire un bâtiment civil.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, wählen Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Zivile Gebäude" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um zu versuchen, dort ein ziviles Gebäude zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona un'unità aerea in grado di bombardare, quindi "Bombarda edifici", poi clicca sulla città bersaglio per cercare di distruggere un edificio civile.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear edificios civiles y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo para intentar destruir un edificio civil.
TEXT.Finnish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb building mission, then click on the target city to attempt to destroy one civil building.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb production mission, then click on the target city to attempt to destroy one factory.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité aérienne capable de bombarder, puis la mission de bombardement d'infrastructure de production. Cliquez ensuite sur la cible pour tenter de détruire une usine.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Produktion" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um zu versuchen, dort eine Fabrik zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona un'unità aerea in grado di bombardare, quindi "Bombarda produzione", poi clicca sulla città bersaglio per cercare di distruggere una fabbrica.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear fábricas y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo para intentar destruir una fábrica.
TEXT.Finnish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb production mission, then click on the target city to attempt to destroy one factory.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.
TEXT.French: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Häfen" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um zu versuchen, dort ein Schiff zu beschädigen oder zu versenken.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona un'unità aerea in grado di bombardare, quindi "Bombarda porto", poi clicca sulla città bersaglio per cercare di danneggiare o affondare una nave.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear puerto, y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo para intentar dañar o hundir un barco.
TEXT.Finnish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.
TEXT.French: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Strategische Luftbombardierung" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um zu versuchen, dort die aktuelle Produktion zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona un'unità aerea in grado di bombardare, quindi "Bombardamento strategico", poi clicca sulla città bersaglio per danneggiare la produzione in corso.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardeo estratégico, y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo para intentar dañar la producción actual.
TEXT.Finnish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.

TEXT.English: Your bombs fell astray and killed some civilians!
TEXT.French: Your bombs fell astray and killed some civilians!
TEXT.German: Dem Feind ist es nicht gelungen, ein Schiff zu bombardieren in %s1_CityName.
TEXT.Italian: Il tuo bombardamento ha mancato il bersaglio e ha ucciso alcuni civili!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tus bombas caen sobre la población y matan civiles!
TEXT.Finnish: Your bombs fell astray and killed some civilians!

TEXT.English: The enemy's bombs fell astray and killed some civilians!

TEXT.German: Deine Bomben verfehlten ihr Ziel und töteten einige Zivilisten!
TEXT.Italian: Il bombardamento nemico ha mancato il bersaglio e ha ucciso alcuni civili!!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Las bombas del enemigo caen sobre la población y matan civiles!
TEXT.Finnish: The enemy's bombs fell astray and killed some civilians!

TEXT.French: You have successfully damaged production in %s1_CityName.
TEXT.German: Die feindlichen Bomben verfehlten ihr Ziel und töteten einige Zivilisten!
TEXT.Italian: Sei riuscito a danneggiare la produzione nemica a %s1_CityName.
TEXT.Spanish: Has conseguido dañar la producción de%s1_CityName.

TEXT.Italian: La produzione a %s1_CityName è stata danneggiata.
TEXT.Spanish: Producción ha sido dañada en %s1_CityName.

TEXT.French: You have failed to damage production in %s1_CityName.

TEXT.Italian: Missione fallita! Non hai danneggiato la produzione a %s1_CityName.

TEXT.Finnish: You have failed to damage production in %s1_CityName.

TEXT.English: Production has not been damaged in %s1_CityName.
TEXT.French: Production has not been damaged in %s1_CityName.
TEXT.German: Die Produktion in %s1_CityName wurde nicht beschädigt.
TEXT.Italian: La produzione a %s1_CityName NON è stata danneggiata.
TEXT.Spanish: La producción no ha sido dañada en %s1_CityName.
TEXT.Finnish: Production has not been damaged in %s1_CityName.

TEXT.German: Kampfeffekte
TEXT.Spanish: Efectos de Batalla

TEXT.English: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Kampfeffekte[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Kampfeffekte sind Effekte, die auf der Karte aufgrund von Gefechten entstehen. Sobald ein Kampf abläuft, beginnen die Kampfeffekte. Der Effekt hält einige wenige Runden an verändert die Menge Gold und Nahrung die ein Geländefeld produziert. Der Effekt läßt nach ein paar Runden nach, aber weitere Kämpfe verlängern im folgenden die Erholung der Geländefelder.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Effetti della battaglia[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Gli "Effetti della battaglia" sono quelli che interessano la mappa a seguito del combattimento. Quando un combattimento si svolge su una casella, su questa si applica un 'effetto': questo resterà per alcuni turni e modificherà la produzione di cibo e oro della casella. Gli "Effetti della Battaglia" scompaiono in un paio di turni, ma ulteriori combattimenti ne aumenteranno la durata.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Efectos de Batalla[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Efectos de Batalla son efectos que ocurren sobre el mapa debido al combate. Cuando hay un combate en una casilla, un Efecto de Batalla comenzara. Este efecto perdurara por unos turnos y afectara a cuanto oro y alimentos la casilla puede producir. Los Efectos de Batalla desaparecen después de un par de turnos, pero si se producen más combates en la misma casilla incrementara el tiempo para que se disipe el efecto.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: Civ Customiser
TEXT.Spanish: Personalizador Civilización

TEXT.English: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Der Civ Customiser ermöglicht es Spielern, ihre Civ vor dem Spiel individuell anpassen. Du kannst das Anführerbild, Deine Eigenschaften, Starttechnologien, spezielle Einheiten und spezielle Gebäude für Deine Civ auswählen. Manche Optionen ermöglichen eine zufällige Auswahlallows, wie z.B. zufällige Eigenschaften.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Personalizza Civiltà[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]"Personalizza Civiltà" consente di modificare la Civiltà prima della partita. Potrai scegliere Leader, Punti di Forza, Tecnologie, Unità Uniche ed Edifici Unici per la tua Civiltà. Per alcune opzioni, come per i 'Punti di Forza', si potrà definire una scelta casuale .[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Personalizador Civilización[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El Personalizador Civilización permite a los jugadores personalizar su Civilizacion antes de que empiece la partida. Puedes elegir los Retratos, Rasgos, Tecnologias iniciales, Edificios y Unidades unicas que se aplicaran a tu Civilizacion. Algunas opciones permiten que se apliquen atributos al azar, como los rasgos aleatorios.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Reichweite: %d1_BombRange
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Alcance: %d1_BombRange

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Treffgenauigkeit: %d1_BombAccuracy
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Precisión: %d1_BombAccuracy

TEXT.German: Fernbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo a Distancia

TEXT.English: [H1]Ranged Bombardment[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ranged Bombardment allows siege units to bombard in the field (as opposed to only bombarding cities). By selecting the bombard icon you can select whether to bombard units, improvements or cities. As well, bombarding is possible from a range. Standard artillery will be able to bombard into adjacent plots, whilst heavy artillery can bombard into plots up to 2 plots away.[PARAGRAPH:2]As of version 1.0, Range bombard now only inflicts standard collateral damage. This makes it useless against single units or large stacks. The head defender is not injured, and damage is capped as per standard collateral damage. This reduces the seige stack of doom tactic and replicates the BTS model of field conflict where ranged bombardment tends to hit the main throng of the opposing army, not the front line and not the seige at the rear. [PARAGRAPH:2]When bombarding cities, Range bombarding also has a slight chance of hitting defenders not just defenses. Seige can standard bombard cities as well as range bombard, for more rapid dropping of city defenses. Range bombarding from inside cities is much less effective than from properly constructed field structures like forts. This replicates the scenario where it has proven difficult to deploy seige effectively behind city structures. [PARAGRAPH:2]When field bombarding, bombarding units from two tiles out has more chance of missing altogether, than from one tile out. Range bombard strength is now customisable in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Bombardement à distance [\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Un bombardement à distance permet aux unités de siège d'effectuer des bombardements de terrain (par opposition aux bombardements de cités). En sélectionnant l'icone Bombardement, vous pouvez choisir de bombarder des unités, des améliorations de terrain ou des villes. Vous pouvez également bombarder à distance. Dans "Sentiers de la guerre", l'artillerie standard peut bombarder des cases adjacentes tandis que l'artillerie lourde est autorisée à tirer jusqu'à une distance de deux cases.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Fernbombardierung[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Die Fernbombardierung ermöglicht Belagerungseinheiten, auch offenes Gelände zu bombardieren (statt ausschließlich Städte). Durch Auswahl des Symbols Bombardierung können Sie wählen, ob Einheiten, Modernisierungen oder Städte bombardiert werden sollen. Darüber hinaus sind auch Bombardierungsangriffe aus der Ferne möglich: Die Standardartillerie kann benachbarte Geländefelder und die schwere Artillerie bis zu 2 Geländefelder entfernt bombardieren.[PARAGRAPH:2]Ab der Version 1.0 bewirkt die Fernbombardierung nur den Standard-Kollateralschaden. Somit ist sie sinnlos gegenüber einzelnen Einheiten und großen Einheitenstapeln. Der stärkste Verteidiger wird nicht beschädigt und der Schaden ist aud den Standard-Kollateralschaden begrenzt. Dies schwächt die Taktik der Belagerungs-Einheitenstapel und reproduziert das BTS-Verhalten indem die Fernbombardierung dazu neigt, den Kern der feindlichen Armee zu treffen, nicht die Fronteinheiten oder die Belagerungseinheiten der Nachhut. [PARAGRAPH:2]When Städte bombardiert werden, so bsteht auch eine geringe Wahrscheinlichkeit, dass Verteidiger getroffen werden. Belagerungseinheiten können aber auch normale Bombardierungen durchführen und damit die Verteidigung der Stadt schneller herabsetzen. Die Fernbombardierung aus Städten heraus ist viel ineffektiver als aus ordentlich gebauten Feldverteidigungsanlagen wie Forts. Dies repräsentiert das Szenario, in dem es schwierig ist, hinter städtischen Strukturen Belagerungswaffen zu positionieren.[PARAGRAPH:2]Bei der Bombardierung aus dem Feld heraus ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines Fehlschusses höher bei 2 Geländefeldern Abstand als bei einem. Fernbombardierung kann in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml nach Wunsch modifiziert werden.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Bombardamento ad area[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Il "Bombardamento ad area" consente alle unità d'assedio di bombardare anche sul campo (invece che solo sulle città). Selezionando l'icona apposita puoi decidere se bombardare unità, miglioramenti o città. Inoltre è possibile bombardare dalla distanza. Così ne La strada per la guerra l'artiglieria sarà in grado di bombardare nelle caselle adiacenti, mentre l'artiglieria pesante potrà farlo fino a una distanza di 2 caselle.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Bombardeo a Distancia[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El Bombardeo a Distancia permite a las unidades de asedio cañonear el campo de batalla (al contrario que bombardear solo ciudades). Si se selecciona el icono de cañoneo, se puede elegir entre bombardear unidades, mejoras o ciudades. También se puede cañonear desde una distancia. Por lo tanto, en "The Road to War", la artillería estándar podrá bombardear casillas adyacentes, mientras que la pesada podrá hacerlo hasta a 2 casillas de distancia.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Ranged Bombardment[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ranged Bombardment allows siege units to bombard in the field (as opposed to only bombarding cities). By selecting the bombard icon you can select whether to bombard units, improvements or cities. As well, bombarding is possible from a range. Standard artillery will be able to bombard into adjacent plots, whilst heavy artillery can bombard into plots up to 2 plots away.[PARAGRAPH:2]As of version 1.0, Range bombard now only inflicts standard collateral damage. This makes it useless against single units or large stacks. The head defender is not injured, and damage is capped as per standard collateral damage. This reduces the seige stack of doom tactic and replicates the BTS model of field conflict where ranged bombardment tends to hit the main throng of the opposing army, not the front line and not the seige at the rear. [PARAGRAPH:2]When bombarding cities, Range bombarding also has a slight chance of hitting defenders not just defenses. Seige can standard bombard cities as well as range bombard, for more rapid dropping of city defenses. Range bombarding from inside cities is much less effective than from properly constructed field structures like forts. This replicates the scenario where it has proven difficult to deploy seige effectively behind city structures. [PARAGRAPH:2]When field bombarding, bombarding units from two tiles out has more chance of missing altogether, than from one tile out. Range bombard strength is now customisable in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Ranged Bombardment[\H1] By selecting the bombard icon you can select whether to bombard units, improvements or cities. Bombarding is also possible from a range with heavy artillery.[PARAGRAPH:2]Range bombard works by inflicting standard BTS collateral damage. This renders it useless against single units or large stacks and the head defender is not injured. [PARAGRAPH:2]When bombarding cities, range bombarding also has a slight chance of hitting defenders not just defenses. Range bombarding from inside cities is much less effective than from properly constructed field structures like forts.
TEXT.French: [H1]Bombardement à distance [\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Le bombardement à distance permet aux unités de siège d'effectuer des bombardements de terrain (par opposition aux bombardements de cités). En sélectionnant l'icone Bombardement vous pouvez choisir de bombarder des unités, des améliorations de terrain ou des villes. Le bombardement à distance est également possible. Dans "Les sentiers de la guerre", l'artillerie standard peut bombarder des cases adjacentes tandis que l'artillerie lourde est autorisée à tirer jusqu'à une distance de deux cases.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Fernbombardierung[\H1]Durch Auswahl des Bombardierungssymbols kann man auswählen, ob Einheiten, Modernisierungen oder Städte bombardiert werden sollen. Auch mit schwerer Artillerie kann aus der Ferne bombardiert werden. [PARAGRAPH:2]Bei der Fernbombardierung wird der normale Kollateralschaden aus BTS angewandt. Sie ist somit sinnlos gegen einzelne Einheiten, große Einheitenstapel wenn der Hauptverteidger nicht beschädigt ist.[PARAGRAPH:2]Wenn Städte bombardiert werden, so hat die Fernbombardierung eine kleine Chance auch Verteidiger und nicht nur Gebäude oder Veteigungswerte zu treffen. Die Fernbombardierung aus Städten heraus ist viel ineffektiver als aus ordentlich gebauten Feldverteidigungsanlagen wie Forts.
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Bombardamento ad area[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Il "Bombardamento ad area" consente alle unità d'assedio di bombardare anche sul campo (invece che solo sulle città). Selezionando l'icona apposita puoi decidere se bombardare unità, miglioramenti o città. Inoltre è possibile bombardare dalla distanza. Così ne La strada per la guerra l'artiglieria sarà in grado di bombardare nelle caselle adiacenti, mentre l'artiglieria pesante potrà farlo fino a una distanza di 2 caselle.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Bombardeo a Distancia[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El Bombardeo a Distancia permite a las unidades de asedio cañonear el campo de batalla (al contrario que bombardear solo ciudades). Si se selecciona el icono de cañoneo, se puede elegir entre bombardear unidades, mejoras o ciudades. También se puede cañonear desde una distancia. Por lo tanto, en "The Road to War", la artillería estándar podrá bombardear casillas adyacentes, mientras que la pesada podrá hacerlo hasta a 2 casillas de distancia.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Ranged Bombardment[\H1] By selecting the bombard icon you can select whether to bombard units, improvements or cities. Bombarding is also possible from a range with heavy artillery.[PARAGRAPH:2]Range bombard works by inflicting standard BTS collateral damage. This renders it useless against single units or large stacks and the head defender is not injured. [PARAGRAPH:2]When bombarding cities, range bombarding also has a slight chance of hitting defenders not just defenses. Range bombarding from inside cities is much less effective than from properly constructed field structures like forts.

TEXT.German: Fernbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Bombardeo a Distancia

TEXT.English: Select an artillery unit, select the bombard mission, then click on the plot to bombard.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité d'artillerie puis une mission de bombardement. Cliquez ensuite sur la case à bombarder.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Artillerieeinheit, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Bombardierung" und klicken Sie dann auf das Geländefeld, das bombardiert werden soll.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona un'unità di artiglieria, seleziona "Bombardamento ad Area", quindi clicca sulla casella da bombardare.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad de artillería, una misión de bombardeo y se hace clic en la casilla a bombardear.
TEXT.Finnish: Select an artillery unit, select the bombard mission, then click on the plot to bombard.

TEXT.German: Wechsle die Nation
TEXT.Spanish: Cambiar Nación

TEXT.English: Select the nation to take control of.
TEXT.French: Select the nation to take control of.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie die Nation, die Sie übernehmen möchten.
TEXT.Spanish: Elige la nación que quieres tomar el control.
TEXT.Finnish: Select the nation to take control of.

TEXT.German: NATION NICHT WECHSELN
TEXT.Spanish: NO CAMBIAR NACIÓN

TEXT.German: Wechselzahl überschritten
TEXT.Spanish: Número de Cambios Sobrepasado

TEXT.English: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.
TEXT.French: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.
TEXT.German: Sie haben die Civ zu oft gewechselt, ein Wechsel ist nicht mehr möglich.
TEXT.Italian: Hai cambiato civiltà troppe volte. Non potrai cambiare ancora civiltà.
TEXT.Spanish: Has cambiado de Civilización demasiadas veces. No podrás cambiar de Civilización de nuevo.
TEXT.Finnish: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.

TEXT.German: Civ-Wechsler
TEXT.Spanish: Intercambiador de Civilizaciones

TEXT.English: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Civ-Wechsler[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Der Civ-Wechsler ermöglicht den Wechsel der Civ im Spiel. Die Einstellungen in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml legen fest, mit welchen Civs man wechseln kann und wie oft. In der Grundeinstellung kann man zweimal mit Civs wechseln, mit denen man Kontakt hat. Weitere Optionen sind die Beschränkung auf Civs auf dem selben Kontinent, Teammitglieder, oder eine beliebige Civ im Spiel.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Cambia Civiltà[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]il MOD "Civ Changer" consente di cambiare Civiltà durante la partita. In relazione alle opzioni definite in 'GlobalDefinesAlt.xml' si stabiliscono quali civiltà possono essere scambiate e con quali, e quante volte si può cambiare per ogni partita. Come valore predefinito, puoi cambiare due volte con Civilità con cui sei entrato in contatto. Altre opzioni sono limitazioni di continente, membri di squadre o tutte le civiltà.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Intercambiador de Civilizaciones[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El Intercambiador de Civilizaciones te permite cambiar la Civilización con la que estás jugando dentro de la partida. Las opciones establecidas en GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determinaran que Civilizaciones pueden realizar el cambio, y el número de veces que pueden hacerlo. Por defecto, podrás cambiar 2 veces con civilizaciones con las que hayas contactado. Opciones adicionales incluyen que se restrinja a las Civilizaciones de tu continente, a los miembros de tu equipo, o a cualquier Civilización en juego.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.German: Dein %s1_UnitName hat einen Gelegenheitstreffer auf %s2_EnUName erzielt!
TEXT.Italian: Una tua unità %s1_UnitName ha bombardato (Fuoco di opportunità) una unità nemica (%s2_EnUName)!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tu %s1_UnitName ha obtenido ataque de oportunidad sobre %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Finnish: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.French: A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.German: Ein %s1_EnUName hat einen Gelegenheitstreffer auf Deinem %s2_UnitName erzielt!
TEXT.Italian: L'unità nemica %s1_EnUName ha bombardato (Fuoco di opportunità) una tua unità (%s2_UnitName)!
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_EnUName ha obtenido ataque de oportunidad sobre tu %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Finnish: ¡A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!

TEXT.German: Kombinierter Einheiten-Stapelangriff
TEXT.Spanish: Ataque Combinado

TEXT.English: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Kombinierter Einheiten-Stapelangriff[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Der kombinierte Einheiten-Stapelangriff ermöglicht es einem kompletten Einheitenstapel einen anderen anzugreifen. Er ersetzt den Kampf Einheit gegen Einheit und ermöglicht es einem Einheitenstapel zusammenzuarbeiten, um einen feindlichen zu eliminieren. [PARAGRAPH:2]Wenn ein Stapel einen anderen angreift, so wird die Luftwaffe auf diesem Feld Angriffe fliegen, Belagerungseinheiten werden den feind beschießen, Ferneinheiten (Bogenschützen) werden einen Pfeilehagel aussenden während die Bodentruppen an der Front angreifen.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Attacco di Gruppo[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]"Attacco di Gruppo" consente ad un intero gruppo di unità di attaccare un gruppo di unità nemiche. Sostituisce il concetto di combattimento "uno contro uno" e consente ad un intero gruppo di unire le forze per eliminare un gruppo nemico.[PARAGRAPH:2]Quando un gruppo attacca un altro gruppo, le unità aeree effettueranno attacchi aerei, le unità da bombardamento spareranno sul nemico, le unità da distanza (es. arcieri) lanceranno frecce dalle retrovie e le unità da mischia attaccheranno il fronte nemico.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Ataque Combinado[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El Ataque Combinado permite un grupo de unidades apiladas en una casilla enfrentarse a otro grupo de unidades apiladas. Reemplaza el combate 1X1 y permite que el grupo apilado una sus capacidades para eliminar el grupo apilado enemigo.[PARAGRAPH:2]Cuando un grupo ataca a otro grupo, los caza realizaran ataques aéreos, los bombarderos bombardearan las unidades de la casilla enemiga, unidades con capacidad de ataque a distancia cañonearan la línea de defensa mientras que las tropas cuerpo a cuerpo se enfrentaran al enemigo en primera línea.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: Gelegenheitstreffer
TEXT.Spanish: Ataque de Oportunidad

TEXT.English: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Gelegenheitstreffer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Gelegenheitstreffer erlaubt es Einheiten, die bombardieren können (z.B. Artillerie) automatisch Feindeinheiten zu beschießen, die sich ihner befestigten Position nähern. Dies geschieht zu Beginn des Durchgangs dieser Einheit.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Fuoco di opportunità[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]"Fuoco di opportunità" consente ad unità da bombardamento (es. Artiglieria) fortificate di effettuare colpi di sbarramento verso le unità nemiche in avvicinamento. Questo processo viene effettuato all'inizio del turno di tale unità.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Ataque de Oportunidad[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El Ataque de Oportunidad permite a las unidades fortificadas capaces de atacar a distancia (como la artillería) disparar automáticamente a unidades enemigas que se muevan cerca de las unidades fortificadas. Este proceso se realiza al principio de esa unidad.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: Aktive Verteidigung
TEXT.Spanish: Defensa Activa

TEXT.English: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: H1]Aktive Verteidigung[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Aktive Verteidigung erlaubt es patroullierenden Jägern feindliche Truppen anzugreifen, die sich ihnen nähern. Dies betrifft Jäger auf Patrouille in beliebigen Geländefeldern (Stadt, Flugzeugträger, etc.). Sie werden autmatisch den Luftkampf starten, wenn sich der Feind auf 2 Felder Entfernung nähert.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Difesa Attiva[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]"Difesa Attiva" consente ai caccia in pattugliamento di attaccare unità nemiche in avvicinamento.Questo include tutti i caccia in pattuglia su ogni obbiettivo (città, portaerei ecc.). I caccia attaccheranno automaticamente il nemico quando questo si avvicinierà nel raggio di 2 caselle.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Defensa Activa[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]La Defensa Activa permite a los cazas en patrulla atacar a tropas enemigas acercándose a su posición. Esto incluye cazas de patrulla en cualquier localización (ciudad, portaaviones, etc.). Atacaran automáticamente en modo ataque aéreo al enemigo que se acerque a 2 casillas de distancia de donde se encuentre el caza patrullando.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: Bogenschützenbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Cortina de Flechas

TEXT.English: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Bogenschützenbombardierung[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Bogenschützenbombardierung ermöglicht es Bogenschützen feindliche Einheiten auf benachbarten Feldern zu bombardieren. Dabei werden die feindlichen Einheiten wie bei der Fernbombardierung beschädigt.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Lancio di frecce a raffica[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]"Lancio di frecce a raffica" consente di attaccare con unità di arcieri una casella adiacente. Come il "Bombardamento ad Area", danneggerà le unità attaccate.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Cortina de Flechas[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]La Cortina de Flechas permite a las unidades de arquería atacar unidades enemigas en casillas adyacentes. Parecido al Ataque a Distancia, la Cortina de Flechas daña al enemigo.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: Bogenschützenbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Cortina de Flechas

TEXT.English: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.
TEXT.French: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.
TEXT.German: "Bogenschützenbombardierung" ermöglicht es mit Bogenschützen benachbarte Geländefelder zu bombardieren um feindliche Einheiten zu beschädigen.
TEXT.Italian: "Lancio di frecce a raffica" consente di attaccare con unità di arcieri una casella adiacente, per danneggiare unità nemiche.
TEXT.Spanish: La "Cortina de Flechas" permite a las unidades de arquería atacar unidades enemigas en casillas adyacentes.
TEXT.Finnish: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.

TEXT.German: Bogenschützenbombardierung
TEXT.Spanish: Cortina de Flechas

TEXT.English: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.
TEXT.French: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Bogenschützeneinheit, wählen Sie die Bombardiermission und anschließend die feindliche Einheit, die beschossen werden soll.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona una unità arciere, seleziona la missione "Lancio di frecce a raffica" e infine selezione l'unità nemica da colpire.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona una unidad de arquería, selecciona la misión Cortina de Flechas y luego selecciona a la unidad enemiga a la que disparar.
TEXT.Finnish: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.

TEXT.English: Use the A-Bomb to decimate an enemy city.
TEXT.French: Utiliser la bombe A pour anéantir une ville ennemie.
TEXT.German: Setzen Sie eine Atombombe ein, um die Bevölkerung einer feindlichen Stadt zu dezimieren.
TEXT.Italian: Usa la bomba atomica per distruggere una città nemica.
TEXT.Spanish: Usa la Bomba Atómica para diezmar una ciudad enemiga.
TEXT.Finnish: Use the A-Bomb to decimate an enemy city.

TEXT.Spanish: Bomba Atómica

TEXT.German: Deine %s1_UnitName hat das Ziel verfehlt.
TEXT.Italian: Una tua unità (%s1_UnitName) ha mancato il bersaglio.
TEXT.Spanish: Tu %s1_UnitName ha fallado el objetivo.

TEXT.English: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.
TEXT.French: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.
TEXT.German: Eine feindliche %s1_EnUName hat das Ziel verfehlt.
TEXT.Italian: Una unità nemica (%s1_EnUName) ha mancato il bersaglio.
TEXT.Spanish: Un %s1_EnUName enemiga ha fallado el objetivo.
TEXT.Finnish: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.

TEXT.German: Jägereinsatz
TEXT.Spanish: Superioridad Aérea

TEXT.English: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]]Jägereinsatz[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Jägereinsatz ermöglicht es Jägern, feindliche Jäger in der Luft oder am Boden anzugreifen.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Ingaggio[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]"Ingaggio" consente alle unità aeree da caccia di attaccare i caccia nemici a terra o in volo.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Superioridad Aérea[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]La Superioridad Aérea permite a los cazas atacar cazas enemigos tanto en tierra como en el aire.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Finnish: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.German: Jägereinsatz
TEXT.Spanish: Superioridad Aérea

TEXT.German: Jägereinsatz
TEXT.Spanish: Superioridad Aérea

TEXT.English: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.
TEXT.French: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.
TEXT.German: "Jägereinsatz" ermöglicht es Jägern, feindliche Jäger in der Luft oder am Boden anzugreifen
TEXT.Italian: "Ingaggio" consente alle unità aeree da caccia di attaccare i caccia nemici a terra o in volo.
TEXT.Spanish: "Superioridad Aérea" permite a los cazas atacar cazas enemigos tanto en tierra como en el aire.
TEXT.Finnish: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.

TEXT.German: Jägereinsatz
TEXT.Spanish: Superioridad Aérea

TEXT.English: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.
TEXT.French: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Jägereinheit, wählen Sie die Jägereinsatzmission und anschließend die feindliche Einheit, die angegriffen werden soll.
TEXT.Italian: Seleziona una unità da caccia, seleziona la missione "Ingaggio" e infine selezione l'unità nemica da attaccare.
TEXT.Spanish: Escoge un caza, selecciona la misión Superioridad Aérea y luego selecciona al caza enemigo a atacar.
TEXT.Finnish: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.

TEXT.German: Kann Jägereinsatzmissionen durchführen.
TEXT.Spanish: Puede realizar la misión Superioridad Aérea.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Kann Fernangriffe durchführen
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Puede realizar Ataques a Distancia

TEXT.German: Dein %s1_UnitName hat eine Fernbombardierung durchgeführt!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità %s1_UnitName ha effettuato un bombardamento ad area!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Tu %s1_UnitName ha atacado a distancia al enemigo!

TEXT.English: You have been ranged bomabard attacked by an enemy %s1_EnUName!
TEXT.French: You have been ranged bomabard attacked by an enemy %s1_EnUName!
TEXT.German: Du wurdest von einem feindlichen %s1_EnUName per Fernbombardierung angegriffen!
TEXT.Italian: Sei stato attaccato (bombardamento ad area) da una unità nemica (%s1_EnUName)!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Has sido atacado a distancia por %s1_EnUName!
TEXT.Finnish: You have been ranged bomabard attacked by an enemy %s1_EnUName!
